channel.title: need some help with a panasonic camara
channel.description:
Recently got a Panasonic SDR-H85 and it's a great camara, i just can't do anything with the files apart from try shoddy edits with the software it came with. Files are in : Video Video.cont Video.pmpd Video.tmb
I've looked all over and can't find anything that will let me use these files in Windows movie maker or anything else, any one know how i can save it to just one file?

item.title: need some help with a panasonic camara
item.dc:creator: Scrue
item.description:
nope, tried that and it just saves in the same format

Read full topic
item.source: need some help with a panasonic camara

item.title: need some help with a panasonic camara
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Never use camera software, just save everything to an SD card and use an SD reader to grab the files.

There should be a DCIM folder on the SD card, and it should have .mov or .avi files in it.

Read full topic
item.source: need some help with a panasonic camara
